bookmarks.description:
URL Stack Uses Markdown?


Yes, because it's not overly bloated for a quick app. And can be formatted in many ways.



It can give you a todo list:

  • i'm not yet done!



You can have nice formatting on your quick take away code on the link. 

console.log('Hello World')



Marked is the parser used by this app. And all the things it can do is listed there.

-be also aware that this textarea does not recognize new line-
bookmarks.rawDesc:
URL Stack Uses Markdown? ---
Yes, because it's not overly bloated for a quick app. And can be formatted in many ways.

It can give you a todo list:

- [x] i'm not yet done!

You can have nice formatting on your quick take away code on the link.

```javascript console.log('Hello World') ```

[Marked](https://github.com/markedjs/marked/) is the parser used by this app. And all the things it can do is listed there.

*-be also aware that this textarea does not recognize new line-*
